thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 3 of 2268
thread.title: Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text: Fabric samples arrived really quickly and the diagrams helpful for measuring up, the order process was very straightforward and the blind arrived within 4 days. It couldn't have been simpler. The quality of the blind is really good - it's functional and smart - and the overall service made it a completely hassle-free process. I'd definitely use again and would recommend to others.
